ai-patthana22.9:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.9:0.3_0: mastered the sensuous worlds, skilled in the domain of sensual pleasures,
ai-patthana22.9:1.1_0: Not with the unwholesome thoughts, nor do they give rise to a good principle.
ai-patthana22.9:1.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana22.9:2.1_0: Not with the unwholesome thoughts, newly acquired good conduct, and those who don’t want to be reborn in the company of the fine-material sphere.
ai-patthana22.9:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
